result.title: Edge aggregates for link-cut trees
result.content: How does one make a link-cut tree support finding the maximum (or anything else of the sort) along the edges of a vertex to the root? All implementations I have seen only support finding aggregates of vertices along such paths, and I think that simply having each vertex store the value of the edge from it to its parent doesn't work well when one links vertices which changes the parents of a bunch of vertices.
